QuestData.Title: Unlikely Allies
QuestData.Description:
I believe this is one of the Keepers' keys! Only Vorrik would know for sure.
We need to head to the temple at once.
My pterrordax can take us there when you're ready, but we need to hurry.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly to the Sanctuary of the Devoted.

Objectives.Objective: Fly to the Sanctuary of the Devoted
